:::Bludgeon:::

::Man, he thought.  No one's ever heard of me!::
Bludgeon: Ya see, i was leader of the Decepticons after Scorponok died, but 
soon, after i was forced away from the planet Klo, The criminal organization 
Cobra gave the original Megatron a new body, that of a tank. When he saw i 
was a threat to his regaining leadership, he blasted me with his rail gun.
